name: invade.io
description:
Invade.io is a new strategy io game with realtime battles and smooth controls! Invade.io is inspired by the best IO games but with more fun.

Play online with players around the world as you try to become the biggest land of them all!

How to play io game:
◉ Your goal is pretty simple! Conquer the largest paper territory.
◉ Attack other players by hitting their tails. Don't be hit by other players!
◉ Defend your territory against others, expand as much as possible and try to find the best strategy to become the king of land.

Game features:
+ 100% online io game, cloud servers all over the world
+ Can choose the best server speed, no lag
+ Easier to play with your friends
+ Offline mode: play with bots when your connection lost
+ Customize your avatar skin

Invade.io dares you to overtake every paper on the grid and become the king of land!

We love to hear from our players!
developers: Twin Dragons Creation & Technology Joint Stock Company
publishers: Twin Dragons Creation & Technology Joint Stock Company
